services.title: What we
services.subtitle: We offer our best services
services.flightDesc: Book flights to your desired destination with ease. Our platform offers competitive prices and convenient booking options.
services.hotelDesc: Find and book the best hotels at your destination. From budget stays to luxury accommodations, we have something for every traveler.
services.adventureDesc: Embark on thrilling adventure tours to some of the most exciting and unexplored destinations. Perfect for adrenaline junkies and nature lovers.

allTours.subtitle: Unforgettable Journeys Tailored to Your Interests. Explore the world in the most beautiful and luxurious ways possible.

about.title: Welcome to
about.subtitle: Your Trusted Travel Agency for Seamless Booking Experiences
about.aboutDesc: TripGo is a leading travel agency offering personalized booking experiences to help travelers plan their perfect vacation. With a wide range of tours, activities, and accommodations, we make your travel dreams come true.
about.missionDesc: Our mission is to provide seamless, reliable, and hassle-free travel booking services that empower our customers to explore the world with ease. We strive to offer exceptional customer service and the best travel deals.
about.professionalDesc: We offer expert assistance and personalized guidance to ensure your trip is perfectly planned.
about.uniqueDesc: We curate exclusive travel packages to unique destinations across the world, ensuring a one-of-a-kind experience.
about.affordableDesc: We ensure our customers get the best value for their money, offering competitive rates for every trip.
about.teamDesc: Our team is dedicated to making your travel experiences unforgettable. We are experts in travel planning and passionate about helping you discover the best destinations.
about.contactDesc: Have questions or need assistance? Feel free to reach out to us!

invoice.errorDesc: There was an error retrieving your booking information. Please try again or contact customer support.
invoice.name: Name
invoice.unableGenerate: Unable to generate PDF: Missing booking data

westminsterBridge.desc: Experience the iconic Westminster Bridge, offering stunning views of the Houses of Parliament and Big Ben in the heart of London.

bali.desc: Relax in the tropical paradise of Bali, Indonesia, known for its beaches, jungles, and vibrant culture.

snowyMountains.desc: Discover the serene beauty of the Snowy Mountains in Thailand, perfect for adventurers and nature lovers.

beautifulSunrise.desc: Wake up early to witness the breathtaking sunrise over Thailand's stunning landscapes.

nusaPendia.desc: Explore the exotic beauty of Nusa Pendia, a tranquil island near Bali, offering pristine beaches and crystal-clear waters.

cherryBlossoms.desc: Experience the magic of Japan in spring, as cherry blossoms bloom, transforming the country into a pink wonderland.

holmenLofoten.desc: Explore the rugged beauty of Holmen Lofoten, with its dramatic landscapes, crystal-clear waters, and vibrant fishing villages.

snowyMountains2.desc: Revisit the magical Snowy Mountains, Thailand, a place of tranquility and adventure perfect for a memorable getaway.
